text: Ernest Robert Suter (10 June 1870 – 1945) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Halifax Town and Notts County. Suter had a twenty- year association with Halifax Town where he had roles as player, trainer, coach, groundsman and general handyman. ==References== Category:1880 births Category:1945 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:English Football League players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Newark F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:Halifax Town A.F.C. players
title: Bob Suter (English footballer)
